job_tasks.phrase: enhancing collaborations across the entire healthcare chain
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly relates to understanding the business context and the goals of improving collaboration within the healthcare sector.

job_tasks.phrase: automating a significant portion of manual administrative processes
job_tasks.justification: This highlights a business objective of improving efficiency through automation, which the developer will contribute to.

job_tasks.phrase: enabling organizations to make better decisions and optimize processes
job_tasks.justification: This statement clearly defines the business impact and goal of the data-driven insights provided by the application.

job_tasks.phrase: integrates with client and supplier systems
job_tasks.justification: This implies the need to handle data from various external systems, a core aspect of data integration.

job_tasks.phrase: connect with planning and HR systems, electronic client records (ECD), systems of external staffing suppliers, and Identity & Access Management (IAM) packages
job_tasks.justification: This lists specific types of systems that require data integration and processing.

job_tasks.phrase: restructuring the architecture and domain model, where events will play a central role
job_tasks.justification: This indicates significant work on the underlying structure and data flow of the system.

job_tasks.phrase: handling complex integrations with new external systems such as planning, HR, and financial tools
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly mentions the task of integrating with and processing data from new external systems.

job_tasks.phrase: Using algorithms, we can automatically identify the most suitable healthcare provider
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates the development or application of algorithms for a specific task (provider identification), which falls under modeling.

job_tasks.phrase: You will primarily work on the backend of the application.
job_tasks.justification: This clearly states the primary area of software development focus.

job_tasks.phrase: enhancing the interface with the internal GraphQL API
job_tasks.justification: This involves developing and maintaining software interfaces for communication between services.

job_tasks.phrase: Our build pipelines with unit tests run automatically, allowing us to release multiple times a day through CI/CD.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the use of CI/CD pipelines and automated testing, which are core components of MLOps/DevOps.

soft_skills.phrase: enhancing collaborations across the entire healthcare chain
dedicate 10% of your time to side projects focused on innovation and personal growth
mentor team members to become better developers
dedicate 10% of your time to side projects focused on innovation
mentor team members to become better developers

classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on traditional software development, system integration, and backend architecture. While it mentions 'using algorithms' for provider identification, there's no explicit focus on building, fine-tuning, or deploying Generative AI models or MLOps specific to GenAI. The core tasks align more with a Senior Software Developer role.
